ja528:5.5: Taramānarūpohāsi → ... rūpo gaṇhāsi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja528:18.3: Paricārakānaṃ sataṃ → paricārakānaṃ sattānaṃ (bj) | paricārikānaṃ sattānaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | parivārakānaṃ sattānaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja528:19.4: Mayhaṃ vā → amhaṃ vā (bj) | mayha vā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | mayhañca (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja528:33.5: puttadāre ca → putte ca dāre ca (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja528:40.4: Utrāsayitvā → citrā sayitvā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | hantvā sayitvā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja528:43.2: ahetuñca pavadanti → hetuñca apavadanti (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja528:52.3: sace → ceva (bj) | cepi (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
ja528:60.2: saññate → saṃyame (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, mr), brahmacārino → brahmacāriye (sya1ed, sya2ed) | brahmacārayo (pts-vp-pli1ed) | brahmacāriyo (csp1ed)
